data_variables.name: num
data_variables.description: The input number being rounded to two decimal places.

data_variables.name: total_candies
data_variables.description: The total number of candies being split among friends.

data_variables.name: num_friends
data_variables.description: The number of friends among whom the candies are split (defaults to 3).

data_variables.name: smallest_abs
data_variables.description: The smallest absolute value between x and y.

data_flow.creation: Passed as an argument to round_to_two_places
data_flow.flow: Used to return a rounded value.

data_flow.creation: Passed as first parameter to to_smash
data_flow.flow: Used to calculate the number of leftover candies.

data_flow.creation: Passed as a second parameter to to_smash (defaults to 3)
data_flow.flow: Determines the number of candies to smash.

data_flow.creation: Calculated using min() on abs(x) and abs(y)
